reviewText: This video, recorded live, provides us with music from many cultures demonstrating how they worship their deity/God. All of the performances are deeply moving and it's wonderful to see peoples from so many cultures and backgrounds sharing their inmost longings, praises and deep devotion. Would that all humankind were as welling to sit down and worship together!!!

I watched this beautiful, diverse musical tribute to the premise that music really does connect all of us to each other on Free Speech TV. It transports one from the pettiness of our present political and economical dilemmas - a transport of spirit sorely needed by all humans in their effort for survival of their physical selves, as well as their mental being, i.e., their souls. For a world music lover, it is undescribably fantastic. ENJOY!~

Deese people be beatin on their heart to the sound of their own drum. Shows the multicultural diversity of the musicians featured. As High Tone would say in "The Orientalist":(From Bass Temperature).."DA sound,Da sound,Da sOund.."
